mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
workplace = #{workplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
high = #{high,jdbcType=INTEGER},
weigh = #{weigh,jdbcType=INTEGER},
income = #{income,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
room = #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hobby = #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, workplace = #{workplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, high = #{high,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weigh = #{weigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, income = #{income,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room = #{room,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hobby = #{hobby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user

age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where phone = #{phone}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM action a inner JOIN user_action ua on a.id = ua.aid INNER JOIN user u on ua.uid = u.id where u.phone = #{phone}
